revised_title: The Morphology and Homology of the Retrocalcarine Region of the Cortex Cerebri
tldr: The author investigates the morphology and homology of the retrocalcarine region of the cortex cerebri, focusing on the distribution of Gennari's stria and its relation to the calcarine sulcus. The study demonstrates that the retrocalcarine sulcus is a distinct feature in the human brain and is present in various mammalian species, providing insights into the evolution of the cerebral cortex.
